knimeNode.name: R Snippet Source
knimeNode.shortDescription: A generic R scripting node that generates a generic R object as ouput without having any input from Knime.

fullDescription.intro:
A generic R scripting node that generates a generic R object as ouput without having any input from Knime.
Make sure that Rserve is running somewhere, and Knime is accordingly configured (Knime->Preferences).
Detailed documentation about the scripting integration:
MPI-CBG SWEG Wiki

ports.inPort: A table which should be pushed to R.
ports.outPort: The result aftr R has been processed the table.
